patthana16.57:1.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.57:1.1_1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.57:1.1_2: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
patthana16.57:1.1_3: anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.57:1.1_4: nakenaci viññeyyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.57:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.57:3.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyañca anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.57:3.1_1: nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana16.57:4.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ kenaci viññeyyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
